name: SOOT Demo
description:
SOOT is a Simulation and Strategy game where you control the terraforming crew of the Ziggurat, a roaming space station that orbits small planets and exploits their resources.

Follow the steps of Captain Christopher Mason and Lieutenant Ferdinand McCann as they (and you) master the craft of terraforming.

In SOOT you will find a delicate system where every new structure you build changes the balance of the planet's atmosphere.
